participant_1.background:
I broke my leg when I was a kid, but I'm all better now!
I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.
i have a new job selling cars.
i m the world s best aunt.
I'm cold, but I'm happy to be with my family.

participant_2.background:
I love going to museums with my friends and seeing all the amazing exhibits.
I have been working on my car at night, trying to fix it without them knowing.
i love to ride my bike.
I have come to terms with my past and am now focused on helping others.
I don't like cats, but I love my parents.

content.text: Hey there!  How are you doing?
Great! Just got home from a long bike ride!
Sounds like fun!  Do you bike often?
Yes! I try to bike to and from work every day.
Oh wow, that's a lot of biking!  I am impressed.
Thanks!  It helps me stay in shape.
I bet it does!  I know I should get some exercise.
What kind of hobbies do you have?
Well, I love to bake with my kids.
Oh that sounds really fun!  Do you have any favorite recipes?
Yes, I love making chocolate chip cookies with them.
That sounds yummy!  I'm not very good at baking, but I love to eat it!
What are some of your other hobbies?
I love going to museums with my friends.
Oh that sounds really fun!  I love learning about new things.
Me too!  I think it's important to keep learning all throughout your life.
I agree!  It makes life so much more interesting.
I'm glad you think so!  It's so nice to meet someone who is so open-minded.
Thanks!  It's nice to meet you too!
